items.headline: Here’s why Goldman Sachs is warning of more selling for stocks this week
items.summary_en: Goldman Sachs analysts led by Gail Hafif says some big influential CTAs are ready to push the sell button on U.S. stocks, especially if the S&P 500 sinks further.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘I’m not made of money’: My heating engineer didn’t fix my radiators on his first visit. Do I pay him a second time?
items.summary_en: “He charged $180 for the second visit for his time, including $40 for the part.”

items.headline: Bad Bunny fails to produce stock market sizzle for two big European brands
items.summary_en: In a market where sometimes tenuous links spell big moves for stocks, the Super Bowl halftime performance from Bad Bunny failed to produce coattails.

items.headline: Billionaire Bill Gates lists 4-bedroom home outside Seattle for $4.8 million, right next door to his estate
items.summary_en: Bill Gates appears to be trimming back his famed Washington compound—listing a home that sits next to his sprawling Xanadu 2.0 estate for $4.8 million.

items.headline: Hims & Hers stock poised for heavy losses after quick U-turn on plan for oral Wegovy competitor
items.summary_en: Hims & Hers stock tumbled in early action on Monday after the U.S. company quickly reversed plans to introduce its own version of Novo Nordisk’s Wegovy oral weight-loss drug.

items.headline: My husband, 73, wants to sell our $300K rental and buy an annuity. Is that wise?
items.summary_en: “He believes the annuity will net $1,600 per month, the same as the rent from the house.”

items.headline: After bitcoin’s fall, pity those wildly enthusiastic investors who borrowed billions against crypto
items.summary_en: The speculation that bitcoin would hit $200,000 in 2025 now seems like a dream. Because it was.

items.headline: I settled my father’s estate, but found a will deeding a mobile home to his stepson. Am I ethically and legally obliged to fix this?
items.summary_en: “I understand that I must initiate probate in his state of residence.”

items.headline: My brother-in-law invested $30K in our California condo. It has a 3% mortgage rate. He’s pushing me to sell. Is now a good time?
items.summary_en: “We’re only breaking even because of rising HOA fees in this state.”

items.headline: U.S. stock futures rise after a wild week on Wall Street, ahead of key jobs and inflation reports
items.summary_en: U.S. stock index futures rose Sunday, ahead of key employment and inflation data coming later this week.
